extension.name: System - SEOSimple
extension.author: Dao By Design
extension.description: This native Joomla 2.5 plugin automatically generates description meta tags by pulling text from the content to help with SEO. It also gives you the ability to set different title configurations. You are using Version 2.2 of the plugin.

field.name: length
field.label: Meta Description Length:
field.description: The length of the meta description content (in characters). This will be rounded off to the nearest word. Default set to 155 characters.

field.name: fpdesc
field.label: Front Page Meta Desc:
field.description: Choose whether to use the Global Config/Metadata Settings value or have the description generated by the plugin using the contents of the page.

field.name: catdesc
field.label: Category Meta Desc:
field.description: Choose whether to use the category description or have it generated from the top article\'s content.

field.name: catnoindex
field.label: Noindex Category Pages [beta]:
field.description: If enabled, category pages will have a 'noindex,follow' robots meta tag added to them. This helps cut down on potential duplicate content penalties. Disabled by default - beta feature, proceed with caution.

field.name: titorder
field.label: Page Title Layout:
field.description: Select how you'd like your page titles to be displayed. Default is [Page Title - Joomla Default].

field.name: fptitorder
field.label: Front Page Title Layout:
field.description: Select how you'd like your front page title to be displayed. Disabled by default.

field.name: customtitle
field.label: Custom Title:
field.description: If you selected an option above that uses [Custom Title], enter a custom title for your site's front page. Default is 'Home'.

field.name: separator
field.label: Separator:
field.description: This is the character that separates your page titles from your site name. By default it is a pipe - but you can change it to whatever you like.

field.name: credittag
field.label: SEOSimple Credit Tag:
field.description: This is a non-site affecting meta tag that gives this plugin a bit of credit. We'd love if you kept it, but you're welcome to remove it. Either way, it is never displayed visibly on your site.
